features: AdvancedSkin Warm: AdvancedSkin technical fabrics improve body comfort by keeping you dry, warm and protected when you need it and where you need it

DWR Treatment-PFC Free Synthetic insulation 60g/m²: Regulates your Body climate to keep you comfortable and warm. Fiberfill fibers reflect the warmth of your body and help it retain heat so you feel comfortable and warm, even when the garment is wet
